content_block_static.name: prtst
content_block_static.static_content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide">
    <g:evaluate>
        var projectStatusGr = new GlideRecordSecure('project_status');
        projectStatusGr.addQuery('number', 'PRJSTAT0010075');
        projectStatusGr.query();

        var data = {};
        if (projectStatusGr.next()) {
            data.executive_summary = projectStatusGr.getValue('executive_summary');
            data.last_week_achievements = projectStatusGr.getValue('achievements_last_week');
            data.key_activities_planned = projectStatusGr.getValue('key_activities_next_week');
        }
    </g:evaluate>

    <style>
        .project-group {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .project-info {
            /* display: inline-block; Remove this line */
            /* width: calc(33.33% - 10px); Remove this line */
            margin-bottom: 10px; /* Add this line */
        }

        .project-info label {
            font-weight: bold;
            display: block;
        }
    </style>

    <h2>Overview</h2>
    <div class="project-group">
        <div class="project-info">
            <label>Executive Summary:</label>
            <span>${data.executive_summary}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="project-info">
            <label>Last Week's Achievements:</label>
            <span>${data.last_week_achievements}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="project-info">
            <label>Key Activities Planned:</label>
            <span>${data.key_activities_planned}</span>
        </div>
    </div>

</j:jelly>
